mapper.select:
select b.* From mt_mod_locator b where b.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} and b.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID = #{locatorGroupId} and b.ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y'
and (b.PARENT_LOCATOR_ID is null or b.PARENT_LOCATOR_ID='')

SELECT b.LOCATOR_ID, b.LOCATOR_CODE, l.LOCATOR_NAME, l.LOCATOR_LOCATION, b.LOCATOR_TYPE, b.LOCATOR_CATEGORY, b.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID, b.LENGTH, b.WIDTH, b.HEIGHT, b.SIZE_UOM_ID, b.WEIGHT_UOM_ID, b.MAX_CAPACITY, b.MAX_WEIGHT, b.ENABLE_FLAG, b.NEGATIVE_FLAG, b1.UOM_CODE sizeUomCode, b2.UOM_CODE weightUomCode, b1_tl.UOM_NAME sizeUomDesc, b2_tl.UOM_NAME weightUomDesc, ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_CODE locatorGroupCode, ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_NAME FROM mt_mod_locator b INNER JOIN mt_mod_locator_tl L ON b.LOCATOR_ID = l.LOCATOR_ID AND l.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_uom b1 ON b1.UOM_ID = b.SIZE_UOM_ID and b1.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_uom b2 ON b2.UOM_ID = b.WEIGHT_UOM_ID and b2.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_uom_tl b1_tl ON b1.UOM_ID = b1_tl.UOM_ID AND b1_tl.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_uom_tl b2_tl ON b2.UOM_ID = b2_tl.UOM_ID AND b2_tl.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator_group ware ON ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID = b.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID and ware.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator_group_tl ware_tl ON ware_tl.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID = ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID AND ware_tl.LANG = #{lang} WHERE b.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
and b.LOCATOR_ID=#{dto.locatorId}

SELECT b.LOCATOR_ID, b.LOCATOR_CODE, l.LOCATOR_NAME, l.LOCATOR_LOCATION, b.LOCATOR_TYPE, b.LOCATOR_CATEGORY, b.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID, b.LENGTH, b.WIDTH, b.HEIGHT, b.SIZE_UOM_ID, b.WEIGHT_UOM_ID, b.MAX_CAPACITY, b.MAX_WEIGHT, b.ENABLE_FLAG, b.NEGATIVE_FLAG, b1.UOM_CODE sizeUomCode, b2.UOM_CODE weightUomCode, b1_tl.UOM_NAME sizeUomDesc, b2_tl.UOM_NAME weightUomDesc, ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_CODE locatorGroupCode, ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_NAME FROM mt_mod_locator b LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator_tl L ON b.LOCATOR_ID = l.LOCATOR_ID AND l.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_uom b1 ON b1.UOM_ID = b.SIZE_UOM_ID and b1.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_uom b2 ON b2.UOM_ID = b.WEIGHT_UOM_ID and b2.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_uom_tl b1_tl ON b1.UOM_ID = b1_tl.UOM_ID AND b1_tl.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_uom_tl b2_tl ON b2.UOM_ID = b2_tl.UOM_ID AND b2_tl.LANG = #{lang} LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator_group ware ON ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID = b.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID and ware.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator_group_tl ware_tl ON ware_tl.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID = ware.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID AND ware_tl.LANG = #{lang} WHERE b.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} and b.LOCATOR_ID = ${locatorId}

select t1.LOCATOR_ID, t1.LOCATOR_CODE, t2.LOCATOR_NAME, t2.LOCATOR_LOCATION, t1.LOCATOR_TYPE, t1.LOCATOR_GROUP_ID, t1.LENGTH, t1.WIDTH, t1.HEIGHT, t1.SIZE_UOM_ID, t1.MAX_WEIGHT, t1.WEIGHT_UOM_ID, t1.MAX_CAPACITY, t1.ENABLE_FLAG, t1.PARENT_LOCATOR_ID, t1.LOCATOR_CATEGORY, t1.NEGATIVE_FLAG, t1.CID, t1.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, t1.CREATED_BY, t1.CREATION_DATE, t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE from mt_mod_locator t1 INNER join mt_mod_locator_tl t2 on (t1.LOCATOR_ID=t2.LOCATOR_ID and t2.LANG=#{locale}) where t1.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} and t1.ENABLE_FLAG='Y' and t1.LOCATOR_ID IN
#{item}
and t2.LOCATOR_NAME like concat('%',#{dto.locatorName} ,'%')
and t1.LOCATOR_CODE like concat('%',#{dto.locatorCode} ,'%')
